name: Soletheon
description: Soletheon is a dragon meme coin on Neon EVM. The purpose of the token is mainly to increase awareness of the Neon EVM ecosystem and help in growing the overall ecosystem. As the interest of the Neon EVM ecosystem has grown over the last month, we are looking into creating the The Lair, which consists of tools and apps that will help users navigate Neon EVM. We are also releasing Dragon NFTs, which are almost complete and will be airdropped to holders.
